DOC.brief_summary: In early study , investigator develop guidebook taught woman supportive behavior help husbands/partners quit smokeless tobacco . This study create website use information guidebook , along interactive feature , video , forum . The investigator conduct randomize trial compare intervention group ( receive website access print guidebook ) delay treatment control condition , learn support intervention effectively teach woman supportive behavior thereby increase partner ' smokeless tobacco cessation rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Media Approach Partner Support Smokeless Tobacco Cessation ( UCare-ChewFree )
DOC.criteria: wife female domestic partner ( live together ) male current user ST product ( snuff chew tobacco ) interested quit ST use willing provide phone number , mail address , email address provide informed consent woman chewer U.S. Canadian resident age 18 old woman chewer able read English woman chewer able access computer
